Design that moves.
Web for brands that refuse to blend in.

Visual & Web
Designer

Crafting experiences that move.

Visual & web designer based in Mumbai, working globally

I design for the scroll‑stopper moment—websites that feel alive, perform fast, and stay memorable. I work with brands and companies to shape identities online through motion, interaction, and considered typography. I love building campaign sites, brand launches, product landers, and portfolios; and I bring motion‑first thinking, WebGL/Three.js when it serves the story, GSAP‑powered micro‑interactions, responsive systems, plus accessibility and performance baked in. If you want a site that looks sharp and feels effortless—one people actually enjoy using—let’s build it.
